article.title: HERD MENTALITY CAN TRACK COWS BUT NOT ILLEGALS?

title_result: HEARING OF THE SENATE JUDICIARY COMMITTEE;SUBJECT: COMPREHENSIVE IMMIGRATION REFORM;CHAIRED BY: SENATOR PATRICK LEAHY (D-VT);WITNESSES: SECRETARY CARLOS M.
